Package gnat.filter.ner

Class Summary
AliBabaSpeciesNer Deprecated.
DefaultSpeciesRecognitionFilter A filter that scans texts for species and assigns NCBI Taxonomy IDs; default implementation, scans for human, mouse, rat, and fruit fly only.
GnatServiceNer A filter that contacts an externally running GnatService to annotate text(s) with named entities.
GOFilter Adds GO code annotations to texts, loading each annotation from a relational database.
LinneausSpeciesServiceNer Contacts a running instance of LINNAEUS to annotate species.
RunDictionaries Filter that contacts local or remote DictionaryServers to perform NER.
RunGoDictionary Runs a local or remote Dictionary tagger for GeneOntology terms on each text.
Recognized GO codes are stored in each Text's ContextModel, with the model type GeneContextModel.CONTEXTTYPE_GOCODES.
SpeciesPostProcessing TODO Not fully implemented yet!!!


Handles post-processing of recognized species, currently tuned towards the AliBabaSpeciesNer: disambiguates species mentions ("cancer") and maps -based on heuristics- genera and families to most likely individual species or strains (for which then genes can be sought).
